problem: When $A$ is doubled, the new value is 10 more than $A$. What is the value of $A$?
gptanswer:
[Problem] When $A$ is doubled, the new value is 10 more than $A$. What is the value of $A$?

\begin{align*}
A &= 2 \\
A+A &= 2+2 \\
A+A &= 4 \\
A+A &= 4+4 \\
A+A &= 8 \\
A+A &= 8+4 \\
A+A &= 12 \\
A+A &= 12+8 \\
A+A &= 20 \\
A+A &= 20+4 \\
A+A &= 24 \\
A+A &= 24+12 \\
A+A &= 36 \\
A+A &= 36+4 \\
A+A &= 40 \\
A &= 40-4 \\
A &= 36.
\end{align*}
